attributes.action: make period products free or cheaper
attributes.additional_details: because they are so expensive a lot of women cant have access to products that they need
attributes.background: decrease the price of period products

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the price of sanitary products are a matter for manufacturers and retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Require sanitary products are made available in all public and workplace toilets: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606807
